tool_description: BMS-API-Similar Items API is a Fashion/E-commerce API, that will result all similar items across the database based on the Input Material.
title: BMS Recommender Systems for E-Commerce

api_list.name: Similaritems v2
api_list.description: List the products customers who bought this product also bought

required_parameters.name: materialid
required_parameters.description: Here are the some of sample Product Ids B01FGZ8VMC, B0199T0DN6, B0199SZVV6, B01DZ5OBGA, B0199U54G6, B0184ZD432

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inoor-shaik-bms-api-similar-items-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/{materialid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inoor-shaik-bms-api-similar-items-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: testfile
